STIG_Items.Requirement: Performance Charts must have mappings set for Java servlet pages.
STIG_Items.Fix_Text:
Navigate to and open: 
/usr/lib/vmware-perfcharts/tc-instance/conf/web.xml
Inside the <web-app> parent node, add the following:
<servlet-mapping>
	<servlet-name>jsp</servlet-name>
	<url-pattern>*.jsp</url-pattern>
	<url-pattern>*.jspx</url-pattern>
</servlet-mapping>
Restart the service with the following command:
# vmon-cli --restart perfcharts

STIG_Items.Requirement: Performance Charts must not have the Web Distributed Authoring (WebDAV) servlet installed.
STIG_Items.Fix_Text:
Navigate to and open:
/usr/lib/vmware-perfcharts/tc-instance/conf/web.xml
Find the <servlet-name>webdav</servlet-name> node and remove the entire parent <servlet> block.
Restart the service with the following command:
# vmon-cli --restart perfcharts
